            • com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured.StructuredLoggingService<L>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - the type of the structured log representation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Unwrappable, HttpService, Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaStructuredLoggingService
    public abstract class StructuredLoggingService<L>
extends SimpleDecoratingHttpService
    A decorating service which provides support of structured and optionally externalized request/response content logging.
